name: Neo Noboru
description:
NEO NOBORU

In search of opportunity, you have decided to ascend from the lightless Underground into open air.

Created with Unity for the 2017 Global Game Jam!

CONTROLS:
WASD - Move
spacebar - Jump

CREDITS:
Programing:
Ryan Beldin
Krista McCullough

Art:
Bree Lindsoe
Kelsey Maher
Marcie LaCerte

SFX from Soundly
Music by plosko
